text:
Grandma's approval is always important...of course she passed the test w/ flying colors 🇨🇴💛💙❤️ #Miami #familytime #grandmaslove A post shared by Dr. Bryan Abasolo (@thebryanabasolo) on Aug 18, 2017 at 2:23pm PDT

Made it to Miami with mi amor 💛 #miaminights #familytime A post shared by Rachel Lindsay (@therachlindsay) on Aug 17, 2017 at 6:36pm PDT

Yesterday - Bryan - Photo - Instagram - Loves

(Excerpt) Read more at: E! Online

Wake Up To Breaking News! SUBMIT

Talk about a high-pressure hometown date!After spending time together as a couple in Texas to be with her fam, newly engaged Bachelorette star Rachel Lindsay hit up Miami with francé Bryan Abasolo to get in some quality time with his family, specifically meeting the chiropractor's grandmother. Too cute!Yesterday, Bryan posted the adorable photo on his Instagram of his two loves meeting at the Anacapri Italian Kitchen. Along...
title: The Bachelorette's Rachel Lindsay and Bryan Abasolo Head to Miami for ''Grandma's Approval''
